page.title: 19Fund-raising - Butley area
page.content: To raise money for a new village hall various fund raising events have been held. The Priory has been opened twice to visitors. A clay pigeon shoot has been held. There have been several car boot sales. Weekly bingo sessions are being held. A fete was organised. Lunches and teas were served on summer Sundays. About six thousand pounds have been raised. Lord of the Manor. ----------------- In 1985 the LOrdship of the Manor Of Butley was sold to a sheikh for 4000 pounds. A special event was the visit of the new Lord to Butley. His visit was covered on television.
